protocol.name: wayland
protocol.copyright: This is an example copyright. It contains several lines. AS WELL AS ALL CAPS TEXT.

interface.name: wl_foo
interface.description: This is the dedicated interface for doing foos over any kind of other foos.

request.name: foo_it
request.description: This will do some foo with its args.

arg.name: number
arg.summary: the number that will be fooed

arg.name: unumber
arg.summary: the unsigned number that will be fooed

arg.name: text
arg.summary: the text that will be fooed

arg.name: float
arg.summary: the float number that will be fooed

arg.name: file
arg.summary: the file descriptor to write all this foo in

request.name: create_bar
request.description: Create a bar which will do its bar job.

enum.name: cake_kind
enum.description: List of the possible kind of cake supported by the protocol.

entry.name: spicy
entry.summary: spicy cake to burn your tongue

event.name: cake
event.description: The server advertises that a kind of cake is available

arg.name: kind
arg.summary: name of this kind of cake

interface.name: wl_bar
interface.description: This interface allows you to bar your foos.

request.name: bar_delivery
request.description: Proceed to a bar delivery of given foo.

request.name: release
request.description: Notify the compositor that you have finished using this bar.

interface.name: wl_display
interface.description: This global is special and should only generate code client-side, not server-side.

interface.name: wl_registry
interface.description: This global is special and should only generate code client-side, not server-side.

request.name: bind

description.summary: bind an object to the display

request.description: This request is a special code-path, as its new-id argument as no target type.

arg.name: name
arg.summary: unique numeric name of the object

interface.name: wl_callback
interface.description: This object has a special behavior regarding its destructor.

event.name: done
event.description: This event is actually a destructor, but the protocol XML has no wait of specifying it. As such, the scanner should consider wl_callback.done as a special case.
